title: Glo Ride
lyrics:
Take me for a ride
Keep me by your side
We can drive to the moon
Walk into the park
Leave you in the dark
You know I'll be back soon



Wherever you go

Wherever you go

Wherever you go (I'll be there)



Feeling so alive

Wanna see the light

Show me what you can do

Reaching for the sky

Make you realize

Make you feel something new



Wherever you go

Wherever you go

Wherever you go (I'll be there)



Feels like I'm driving back home

Like I'm driving back home



I'll be there
